channel.title: Need help with smf forums
channel.description: umm ok, i made a banner and i had to download it.how do i get it so like the image is in my siganture? not the link or w\e i need the image to appear, all help appreciated, also if it helps this is the link to my forums http://bradscape.smfforfree3.com/index.php[br][size=1]Posted on: June 29, 2007, 02:26:19 PM[/size][hr]Grr..can anyone help me?

item.title: Need help with smf forums
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

Ya take forums and message boards and C&P it to the signature, don’t put img tags because they’re already there.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with smf forums
item.dc:creator: @i_ancients_i i ancients i
item.description:
@i_ancients_i wrote:

[quote=“Eh Pretty Easy, post:8, topic:118129”]Ancients, you upload an image like you go to imageshack.us, upload it, get the direct link to the image the copy and paste it into your signature, after that you put it in image tags like [img][/img][code] you put it between the img's.[/code][/quote] I use tinypic.com it’s much faster, what link would i use tho? for forums and message boards?

Read full topic
